import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.tsx'

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')!).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <App />
  </StrictMode>,
)

content.content:
1‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     2‚Üíimport { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     3‚Üíimport { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíconst buttonVariants = cva(
     8‚Üí  "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4 shrink-0 [&_svg]:shrink-0 outline-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
     9‚Üí  {
    10‚Üí    variants: {
    11‚Üí      variant: {
    12‚Üí        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    13‚Üí        destructive:
    14‚Üí          "bg-destructive text-white hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
    15‚Üí        outline:
    16‚Üí          "border bg-background shadow-xs hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:bg-input/30 dark:border-input dark:hover:bg-input/50",
    17‚Üí        secondary:
    18‚Üí          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    19‚Üí        ghost:
    20‚Üí          "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground dark:hover:bg-accent/50",
    21‚Üí        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    22‚Üí      },
    23‚Üí      size: {
    24‚Üí        default: "h-9 px-4 py-2 has-[>svg]:px-3",
    25‚Üí        sm: "h-8 rounded-md gap-1.5 px-3 has-[>svg]:px-2.5",
    26‚Üí        lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-6 has-[>svg]:px-4",
    27‚Üí        icon: "size-9",
    28‚Üí        "icon-sm": "size-8",
    29‚Üí        "icon-lg": "size-10",
    30‚Üí      },
    31‚Üí    },
    32‚Üí    defaultVariants: {
    33‚Üí      variant: "default",
    34‚Üí      size: "default",
    35‚Üí    },
    36‚Üí  }
    37‚Üí)
    38‚Üí
    39‚Üífunction Button({
    40‚Üí  className,
    41‚Üí  variant,
    42‚Üí  size,
    43‚Üí  asChild = false,
    44‚Üí  ...props
    45‚Üí}: React.ComponentProps<"button"> &
    46‚Üí  VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> & {
    47‚Üí    asChild?: boolean
    48‚Üí  }) {
    49‚Üí  const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí  return (
    52‚Üí    <Comp
    53‚Üí      data-slot="button"
    54‚Üí      className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    55‚Üí      {...props}
    56‚Üí    />
    57‚Üí  )
    58‚Üí}
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üíexport { Button, buttonVariants }
    61‚Üí

     6‚Üí  return (
     7‚Üí    <input
     8‚Üí      type={type}
     9‚Üí      data-slot="input"
    10‚Üí      className={cn(
    11‚Üí        "file:text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground selection:bg-primary selection:text-primary-foreground dark:bg-input/30 border-input h-9 w-full min-w-0 rounded-md border bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-base shadow-xs transition-[color,box-shadow] outline-none file:inline-flex file:h-7 file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 md:text-sm",
    12‚Üí        "focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px]",
    13‚Üí        "aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
    14‚Üí        className

    17‚Üí    />
    18‚Üí  )
    19‚Üí}
    20‚Üí

1‚Üíimport * as React from "react"
     2‚Üíimport { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     3‚Üíimport { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üíimport { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíconst badgeVariants = cva(
     8‚Üí  "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full border px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium w-fit whitespace-nowrap shrink-0 [&>svg]:size-3 gap-1 [&>svg]:pointer-events-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive transition-[color,box-shadow] overflow-hidden",
     9‚Üí  {
    10‚Üí    variants: {
    11‚Üí      variant: {
    12‚Üí        default:
    13‚Üí          "border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-primary/90",
    14‚Üí        secondary:
    15‚Üí          "border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-secondary/90",
    16‚Üí        destructive:
    17‚Üí          "border-transparent bg-destructive text-white [a&]:hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
    18‚Üí        outline:
    19‚Üí          "text-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-accent [a&]:hover:text-accent-foreground",
    20‚Üí      },
    21‚Üí    },
    22‚Üí    defaultVariants: {
    23‚Üí      variant: "default",
    24‚Üí    },
    25‚Üí  }
    26‚Üí)
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üífunction Badge({
    29‚Üí  className,
    30‚Üí  variant,
    31‚Üí  asChild = false,
    32‚Üí  ...props
    33‚Üí}: React.ComponentProps<"span"> &
    34‚Üí  VariantProps<typeof badgeVariants> & { asChild?: boolean }) {
    35‚Üí  const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "span"
    36‚Üí
    37‚Üí  return (
    38‚Üí    <Comp
    39‚Üí      data-slot="badge"
    40‚Üí      className={cn(badgeVariants({ variant }), className)}
    41‚Üí      {...props}
    42‚Üí    />
    43‚Üí  )
    44‚Üí}
    45‚Üí
    46‚Üíexport { Badge, badgeVariants }
    47‚Üí

content.text:
**Lagerverwaltungssystem ist fertig!**

Das System enth√§lt:

- **Dashboard** mit Statistik-Karten (Gesamtbestand, niedriger Bestand, nicht verf√ºgbar, Gesamtwert)
- **Inventar-Tab**: Artikel√ºbersicht mit Suche, Status-Badges (Auf Lager/Niedriger Bestand/Nicht verf√ºgbar)
- **Kategorien-Tab**: Verwaltung von Artikelkategorien (CRUD)
- **Lagerorte-Tab**: Verwaltung von Lagerorten mit Code (CRUD)
- **LivingApps-Backend**: Alle Daten werden persistent gespeichert

Design: Professionelles Warehouse-Theme mit Blau/Orange-Akzenten und subtiler Grid-Pattern.
